name: Barbie as Rapunzel: A Creative Adventure
name_original: Barbie as Rapunzel: A Creative Adventure
description:
Barbie as Rapunzel: A Creative Adventure is a puzzle game developed by Funnybone Interactive. It was originally released in 2002. Vivendi Universal Games published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Barbie as Rapunzel: A Creative Adventure is available on PC.
